Interface TaskVisitor

All Superinterfaces:
ITaskVisitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
CountByStateVisitor, CsvFlatTaskVisitor, PlainTextFlatTaskVisitor
public interface TaskVisitor extends ITaskVisitor
Visitor interface required by the project (see Requirements.md).

Extends ITaskVisitor so that domain tasks can call ITask.accept(TaskVisitor) with a unified visitor type. No additional methods are defined; this type exists to satisfy the required interface signature in the project specification.
